txt.en: 'While exploring Ronglagam, I noticed a crack leading towards a large underground cavern system.'
Varthmath can be found near Ronglagam in Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Varthmath near Ronglagam.
'I am ready when ever you are.'
'There is no doubt in my mind that the obelisk we destroyed was a creation of the Angmarim.'

'You destroyed an Angmarim obelisk deep under Máttugard? I have had my suspicions, but nothing I would consider a solid fact. Your find does partially confirm my suspicion, however. I do not believe the Angmarim are yet in Máttugard. I believe that someone else is placing their fell structures for them!'
Zidir-nesad, the Steepset can be found in the western part of Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Voina at Zidir-nesad.
Zidir-nesad, the Steepset can be found in the western part of Máttugard.\n\nYou should talk to Varthmath at Zidir-nesad.

'[placeholder], while exploring Ronglagam, I noticed a crack leading towards a large underground cavern system. Perhaps whomever placed the runes on the buildings, placed some in the caverns beneath Ronglagam. Should we continue our search within the caverns?'
Something stirs the creatures of Máttugard from within the caverns, deep under the Mighty Court.

'There is no doubt in my mind that the obelisk we destroyed was a creation of the Angmarim. I saw such fell structures during the War of Three Peaks. However, I have not seen a single Angmarim outpost in all of Máttugard. We should speak with Voina about what we have learned. While Máttugard is certainly safer, these runes are troubling still.'
